version_description: Lyst 3.4 is a quick release focused on improvements and bug fixes. Enjoying Lyst? You can easily review & rate the app from the You tab. You can also email us at customercare@lyst.com

Lyst 3.5 contains new features that make shopping on Lyst even easier.
• You’ll no longer see out-of-stock products when shopping Related Products.
• We’ve made the app work much better when you shop a specific Designer or Store.

Enjoying Lyst? You can easily review & rate the app from a shortcut on the “You” tab. You can also email us directly at customercare@lyst.com

Lyst 3.6.1 has once again made it easier to find items you’ll love, and get the best price for them.
• Lyst will soon show you promotions offered by stores Lyst sells, right next to the price.
• When you view a product from a list, you can now swipe left & right to view other products in the list.
• It's even easier to shop the designer when you view a product.

Enjoying Lyst? You can easily review & rate the app from a shortcut on the “You” tab. You can also email us directly at customercare@lyst.com

With Black Friday sales just around the corner, it's the perfect time to update your wardrobe.

• New cart: You can now shop from multiple stores with one checkout directly in the app.
• Improved browsing: Products are now even easier to shop from the home screen.
• Big fixes: Some small tweaks to make your shopping experience easier.

Thanks for using Lyst!

We’ve been hard at work squishing a few bugs, including one that was causing the app to crash when you removed a filter.
Keep an eye out for bigger updates coming soon!!

In this update we've fixed some bugs and improved the overall speed and reliability of the app. We've got some exciting new changes coming in our next update, so stay tuned!

Important: We will soon be removing the cart from the app. This will allow all shoppers to have a better experience going forward, but also means the any items that remain in your cart will be lost. Make sure you purchase the items soon or if you're not ready to purchase, use "Save for later" to keep track of the items you love. This will also allow you to receive relevant updates about them!

Make sure you purchase the items soon or if you're not ready to purchase, use "Save for later" to keep track of the items you love. This will also allow you to receive relevant updates about them!

In the past few releases, we've been hinting at something exciting coming soon. Well soon is now. As promised here's the update you've all been waiting for, just in time for the holiday season!

We've redesigned our app from the ground up to really focus on helping you find the fashion you love. You'll find we've put search & recommendations at the centre of your app, made it easier to get to your account details and made sure to bring that full-screen goodness to the sparkly new iPhone X.

We hope you love the new update as much as we do but, as always this is only the first step, there's plenty of exciting work going on behind the scenes that we look forward to sharing with you soon.

The holiday season is here, so remember that you get alerts when your saved items go on sale (you just need to tap on the heart to save an item). We don't want you to miss out on all those great deals!

As always, if you have any thoughts or ideas you'd like to share with us please feel free to email us at customercare@lyst.com. We want to build the best app that we can and we'd love to hear what you need.

In this update, we've upgraded our search results to make it even easier to find the items you like!
We have also fixed a few bugs and sorted most of the visual issues in the new app, as well as updating the feedback button so that you can always send us comments and feedback.
Finally, we've laid the groundwork for exciting new features coming your way soon.

Lyst is starting the year strong with yet another exciting release!
We've added new features by popular demand:

∙ Your most recent searches are now immediately visible on your Home screen. It's now faster than ever to pick up the hunt for your next wardrobe item.

∙ Just tap the search bar to get inspired by relevant trending searches. See something that sparks your interest? Simply tap the search that fits the bill to be taken straight to relevant products - no more typing required.

∙ We've added an easy-to-use 'Share' button on all product pages, so you can quickly ask your friends and family for advice on your choices and share the item via your preferred app. Much easier than a screenshot!

Stay tuned here as we are only getting started, and 2018 will be filled with many more improvements. We value your continuous feedback, so please use the relevant section on the Account tab to send comments and questions our way!

This release includes a new convenient way to narrow your results when searching by category.
Try tapping the 'Categories' button to easily add filters to your chosen category.
Look at the item count go down as you filter more - helping you find the items you love even faster!

We've also fixed a lot of bugs (including a nasty one not letting you follow your favourite designers!) and improved overall performance to make the app even more enjoyable to use.

We value your continuous feedback, so please use the relevant section on the 'account' tab to send comments and questions our way about this new feature!

We've been working hard fixing bugs and making visual improvement for iPhone X. We'll be back soon with exciting news! In the meantime, stay tuned and keep Lyst's blue heart beating with every purchase!

In this release, we've updated our data and privacy policies to give you more control.

Also, from now on, you'll be able to use your Google account to sign up and log in.

Finally, we've focused on bug fixes and performance improvements to give you the best possible experience, so you can find what you're looking for even faster.

Please don't forget to leave us your feedback in the Account tab and keep Lyst's blue heart beating with every purchase!

Introducing Discover! Find curated edits for every style, occasion, mood and moment.

Browse our curated edits from ‘Classic luxury’ and ‘Preppy’ to ‘Paradise island’ we have something to inspire everyone.

New edits will be added regularly based on our Lyst data, the spikes and trends your searches are creating. Lust worthy celebrity looks, micro trends, plus what to wear to a wedding. Update now to start discovering.

Discover is available on iPhone and will be available on iPad soon.

Let us know what you think, we would love your feedback. Please leave a rating on the App Store or send us a message in the “Account” tab of the app.

We’ve refined discover to make it even easier to shop by trend, occasion and mood.

In fact we’re so proud of discover that we’ve made it the home screen of the whole app! We’ll continue to add new curated edits so be sure to check back regularly.

We’ve also made it much easier to follow brands you like. Now when you follow brands we’ll show you when they have new products you haven’t seen before. What are you waiting for? Get following!

Meet Discover daily, the first (of many) personalised discover feeds!

Discover daily shows you new products from the brands you follow and will be constantly updated with fresh products tailored to your personal style.

But wait there’s more! We also show when we publish new discover feeds too. It’s like all our Christmases have come at once.

But wait there’s more! We also show when we publish new discover feeds too. It’s like all our Christmases have come at once.

It’s the dawn of a new age. Today we are proud to unveil a refreshed look and feel on the Lyst app!

This new look is part of Lyst’s wider brand refresh, which aims to capture Lyst’s values and give a cleaner, more intuitive experience to our users.

But the brand refresh is not just really, really, ridiculously good looking. It also forms a strong foundation for us to build from in the future.

Also: iPad users, rejoice — Discover is now on iPad! It’s big and it’s beautiful. See what you’ve been missing out on, iPad users.

It’s the dawn of a new age. Today we are proud to unveil a refreshed look and feel on the Lyst app!

This new look is part of Lyst’s wider brand refresh, which aims to capture Lyst’s values and give a cleaner, more intuitive experience to our users.

But the brand refresh is not just really, really, ridiculously good looking. It also forms a strong foundation for us to build from in the future.

Also: iPad users, rejoice — Discover is now on iPad! It’s big and it’s beautiful. See what you’ve been missing out on, iPad users.

Lots in this one! Firstly, we have completely overhauled the discover tab to make it more relevant to you, and just plain better.

Now you’ll see a personalised “Made for you” section with discover feeds crafted specifically for you based on brands you follow. The best part? The more brands you follow, the better it gets!

You’ll also see brand new “Styles” on the discover tab as well. These contain all the best and more relevant brands and stores for each style. You’ll see all your favourite brands and find some fresh ones as well.

There’s a brand new onboarding experience as well! Now when you sign up for a Lyst account, we’ll ask you what brands you’re wearing (in a none creepy way, we swear). This helps us make sure that we make really good suggestions for you.

And one more thing: Now when you search, we’ll recommend brands right at the top of the screen. It just makes sense.

Phew! Told you there was a lot. Update your app and let us know what you think.

Remember that sweet onboarding experience we shipped in the last update? We made it even better. Now we show popular brands and make dynamic recommendations based on what brands you follow. Science!

We also made some changes to how discover looks on iPad to take advantage of that beautiful screen. Expect to see it go live in the next few days. Your eyeballs will thank us.

And finally, our intrepid backend engineers tell us they fixed an annoying bug that wouldn’t let new users log in with Facebook. Keep up the good work, guys!

In our final, festive update of 2018 we have streamlined and simplified our entire onboarding experience. Now creating an account is dramatically easier than it was before!

(Note you will now need an account to use the Lyst app. But it is worth it, we swear. Really. We have done this so we can make really good recommendations specifically for you.)

2018 has been a bumper year where we shipped 18 updates! We have thoroughly enjoyed your company this year and hope you are as excited for 2019 as we are.

So from the app squad family to you and yours, Merry Christmas!

We’ve been working hard to make finding and buying fashion even easier.

Here’s what’s included:
- Improved size selection UX for shoes. Where possible shoe sizes will be displayed within product details using a size guide relevant to your locale
- We’ve also streamlined the interface - Alerts for items you’re looking for are in the top navigation
- Finally we have renamed For You as Home containing the latest freshest content and an updated design
- We’ve also updated the visuals during onboarding

We’ve also fixed a few bugs as usual

We hope you enjoy our latest release and please do let us know if you have any feedback.
